blog.name: acepalindrome
blog.title: you're going to be something extraordinary
blog.description: Hello, this is Palindrome! I'm currently doing my best to pretend that I'm a functional and well adjusted adult, with varying levels of success! Around this neck of the woods you'll find history stuff, nature stuff, whatever fandoms I'm into at the moment, fanfics I write when I can muster up the energy, the occasional mental breakdown and a variety of fun facts I come across or things I find interesting. Feel free to follow or drop me a line, I promise I'm quite tame.

I have intense feelings about Star Wars. I do not tolerate any Star Wars under the Disney label. Generally pissed off but that's because I work with teenagers and get up at an ungodly hour of the morning.

summary: Even To The Wild Woods: A Widomauk Fic Coming Late Spring Written by steelneena on AO3, with thanks for the INCREDIBLE art by...
caption:
Even To The Wild Woods: A Widomauk Fic

Coming Late Spring

Written by steelneena on AO3, with thanks for the INCREDIBLE art by THE AMAZING @ruushes

Caleb Widogast is a young man attending college in Oldenburg, Germany. After an accident on a bicycle, he starts having dreams. Strange dreams. Dreams about…himself? Dreams he forgot he had before, long ago, as a child. Dreams of a man from another world, a man named Bren Aldric Ermendrud, a mage of mythic days who also had dreams, dreams of fire and dreams of a creature, a lavender hued humanoid, trapped within a willow, seeking freedom from magical confines.

To the chagrin of all around him, Caleb begins to suspect they might be memories of a past life. As he lives out in dreams what happened to Bren Aldric Ermendrud and the Nymph, a mystic named Mollymauk, he returns home to the Isle of Rügen to search for the place where the willow might be, crossing worlds, - in dreams and in life - in hopes of giving himself a happier ending than Bren Aldric Ermendrud ever got.

AO3 link

summary: Honestly I can really see Modern AU Beauregard being an investigative journalist. Digging up dirt on corrupt politicians and...
body:
Honestly I can really see Modern AU Beauregard being an investigative journalist. Digging up dirt on corrupt politicians and stuff, or even digging into the real reason behind the war between Xhorhas and the Dwendalian Empire

That or she’s the star of the hit reality TV show, Ghost Punchers

blog.name: shitthem9wouldsay
blog.title: Just A Bunch Of Assholes
blog.description:
Me and my dumbass friends say a lot of shit that I think the m9 would also say. Buckle up.

(Seriously all of these quotes are directly lifted from conversations with my friend group, we’re idiots but we love each other)

summary:
Nott: That’s pretty sicknasty
Beau: But are /you/ sicknasty?
Nott: You’re all sicknasty in my heart. Except for Caleb. 
Beau:...
body:
Nott: That’s pretty sicknasty

Beau: But are /you/ sicknasty?

Nott: You’re all sicknasty in my heart. Except for Caleb.

Beau: Excuse me. Caleb is the sickest and nastiest of them all.

reblog.comment:

summary: :flower emoji: (I dont have real emojis)
question: :flower emoji: (I dont have real emojis)
answer:
so. jester’s got a weasel-scarf and caleb’s got a cat-scarf. my headcanons for the rest of the nein’s scarf animals are as follows:

beau: a rat, duh. she’s missing an eye and several inches off her tail and definitely has rabies. loves beau, will bite anyone else who dares touch her

yasha: a cat! yasha needs her own emotional support feline. he’s solid white and likes hiding in her hair

nott: a capuchin monkey. she picked her up on the isles and is teaching her how to steal

caduceus: giant worm. jester tied a bow around it.

fjord: a tiny dog. fantasy chihuahua. loud, angry, three pound ball of rage.

molly: you know he’d get a peacock. just a full on bird.

summary: I got to say, this hiatus following a Liam induced cliffhanger was alot easier to get through than the last one. At least with...
body: I got to say, this hiatus following a Liam induced cliffhanger was alot easier to get through than the last one. At least with this one we have a chance that this will be a stress free episode unlike with the Flame Wall one were we knew it was going to be a long fight.

summary: I am trying to be the mature twenty-nine year old adult that I am and focus on work and other Important Things that I need to...
body: I am trying to be the mature twenty-nine year old adult that I am and focus on work and other Important Things that I need to accomplish with the rest of my day, but my brain won’t stop screaming “It’s Thursday!” over and over and over again, as if I weren’t already accutely aware of that fact.

reblog.comment: I am trying to be the mature twenty-nine year old adult that I am and focus on work and other Important Things that I need to accomplish with the rest of my day, but my brain won’t stop screaming “It’s Thursday!” over and over and over again, as if I weren’t already accutely aware of that fact.

blog.name: chemistyeza
blog.title: Chemistry is my speciality
blog.description: Indie RP blog for Yeza the halfling from Critical Role

summary: The meeting is either going to be very happy or very sad, or very awkward because they are still saving him. He cant exactly run...
body:
The meeting is either going to be very happy or very sad, or very awkward because they are still saving him. He cant exactly run away from them. It’ll be an awkward month or so treck back to the empire to bring Yeza home, if he doesn’t accept Nott. 

It’ll be relatively more calm if he accepts her, I assume. And much less like a hostage situation.
